articles.author: Thomas Biesheuvel, Dinesh Nair, Paul-Alain Hunt
articles.title: BHP Anglo American Bid: How the Offer Came Together. What Happens Next? - Bloomberg
articles.description: CEO Mike Henry is unlikely to drop his pursuit despite initial rejection by Anglo.
articles.content:
When Mike Henry took over as chief executive officer of BHP Group in 2020, the worlds biggest mining company had lost its swagger. 
Bruised by a series of painful missteps and a run-in with activist… [+215 chars]

articles.title: Black American Man Seen Pleading ‘I Can’t Breathe’ As Cops Pin Him To The Floor, Dies Few Hours Later - News18
articles.description: Frank Tyson was suspected of leaving the scene of a single-car accident.
articles.content: Ohio police released video of a Black man who died at a local hospital after repeatedly telling officers I cant breathe as they pinned him to the floor of a bar and handcuffed him, evoking memories o… [+2779 chars]

articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Japanese Yen rallies to just shy of 157.00 versus the USD - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) languishes near a multi-decade low against its American counterpart during the Asian session on Friday as traders keenly await the outcome of the highly-anticipated Bank of Japan (BoJ) policy meeting.
articles.content:
• The Japanese Yen weakens across the board after BoJ announced its policy decision. 
  • A shortlived spike in the Yen may be testament to an attempt by the Japanese authorities to interve… [+6990 chars]
